sentences.english: No wonder his wife is penniless; he is always playing the horses and losing his money. (CDIP)
sentences.chinese: 難怪他妻子身無分文，他老是賭賽馬，把錢都輸光了。

sentences.english: No wonder the man in shabby clothes was mistaken for a thief by the police.
sentences.chinese: 難怪那個衣衫襤縷的人被警察誤是小偷了。

sentences.english: No wonder we feel sick at the thought of choosing just one.
sentences.chinese: 要從中選一種三明治，難怪會讓人覺得頭疼。

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我上次去陽明山國家公園時，聞到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: No wonder we are seeing so many frauds on the market.
sentences.chinese: 也難怪我們在這個市場上看到了如此之多的舞弊。

sentences.english: No wonder she wins, for she is all old-shoe charm.
sentences.chinese: 難怪她獲得勝利，因爲她有令人一見如故的魅力。

sentences.english: No wonder we feel good and depression is left in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我們感覺良好，抑鬱被拋於九天雲外。

sentences.english: With so many island paradises to visit, it's no wonder the area is so popular.
sentences.chinese: 這區有許多島嶼渡假天堂可供遊訪，難怪如此熱門。

sentences.english: Morgan:No wonder the department stores earn billions in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 難怪百貨公司可以在一天就賺進上億的鈔票。

sentences.english: So it was no wonder that Strippy was so high-strung, lacking freedom and exercise.
sentences.chinese: 失去自由又缺乏鍛鍊，難怪條紋每天都高度緊張。

sentences.english: Nick:No wonder almost everyone in our office has a Masters Degree.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我們辦公室幾乎人人都念過碩士。

sentences.english: No wonder they love it and are longing for more.
sentences.chinese: 難怪她們如此愛它，而且渴望更多的續集。

sentences.english: After giving it a read, you could be forgiven for thinking the team was in a bit of disarray
sentences.chinese: 閱讀之後，也難怪你會覺得遊騎隊有點不在狀態。

sentences.english: No wonder people said this hotel was pushy and bullying. But, how was this possible?
sentences.chinese: 難怪人家說地宮酒店囂張跋扈，可是，怎麼可能呢？

sentences.english: No wonder their name derives from the angry Mayan god of storms and wind: Huracán.
sentences.chinese: 難怪它們的名字是從瑪雅的風暴和雨神名字衍生而來。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
